bibl.title: Opisanie Nabatei v ""Periple Èritrejskogo morja"" (k opredeleniju žanrovoj prinadležnosti istočnika). [The Description of Nabataea in the ""Periplus of the Erythraean Sea"" (Towards the Definition of the Genre of the Source).]
bibl.note: Challenges the opinion that the ""Periplus of the Erythraean Sea"" was based purely on the personal experience of its author, who is normally supposed to have been a sea-trader or a ship-owner. Supposes that the author in his description of Nabataea referred to the information contained in various sources and had most probably never been on the North Arabian shore of the modern Red Sea. - Avec résumé en anglais.
